TBT Enquiry Point Survey
The purpose of this survey is to assist the WTO Secretariat in obtaining information about the functioning of TBT Enquiry Points. This information will be used in the preparation of the Enquiry Point Guide. The survey is comprised of 57 questions. The estimates time for the completion of the survey is 45 minutes

Responses to questions will not be attributed to specific Members, and will be kept anonymous by the Secretariat.
Name: Email:
Member:
A. Primary Functions 1. What are the three main functions of your Enquiry Point? (Please select three options)
Handling of comments on your notifications
Handling of requests for information
Coordinating internally (between government bodies and stakeholders)
Using online tools
Building interest of stakeholders through promotional activities
Submitting notifications and its related activities
Providing technical assistance to other Members' Enquiry Points
Publishing (including early notices, draft texts, and adopted final texts)
Providing input or responses to specific trade concerns
other

2. Do you keep records on the number of comments received per year? Yes No
